sqlMap.sql:
SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.EVT_TYPE , A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , B.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM , A.PRJ_ID , C.PRJ_NM , A.USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM, A.PRJ_EVT_ID , A.EVT_USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', NVL(B.USE_CD, A.EVT_USE_CD), '1') AS EVT_USE_CD_NM, A.EVT_START_DATE AS EVT_START_SEQ , A.EVT_END_DATE AS EVT_END_SEQ , TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(A.EVT_START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') EVT_START_DATE, TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(A.EVT_END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') EVT_END_DATE, TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(A.EVT_START_TIME, 'HH24MI'), 'HH24:MI') EVT_START_TIME, TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(A.EVT_END_TIME, 'HH24MI'), 'HH24:MI') EVT_END_TIME, TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(A.EVT_START_DATE || A.EVT_START_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EVT_START_FULL_DATE, TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(A.EVT_END_DATE || A.EVT_END_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') EVT_END_FULL_DATE, A.EVT_START_DAY_WEEK , A.EVT_END_DAY_WEEK , A.EVT_NM , A.EVT_DESC, A.EVT_BG_COLOR , A.EVT_COLOR , A.EVT_ALL_DAY_CD , A.REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY, A.REG_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, '1') AS REG_USR_NM, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DTM_DAY, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.MODIFY_USR_ID, '1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM (SELECT * FROM PRJ5000) A INNER JOIN PRJ1000 B ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = B.PRJ_ID ) INNER JOIN PRJ1000 C ON ( A.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND T1.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND T1.USR_ID = #usrId#
AND T1.PRJ_EVT_ID = #prjEvtId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_EVT_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_EVT_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'EVT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_EVT_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(PRJ_EVT_ID) AS NEW_EVT_ID FROM PRJ5000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# )
INSERT INTO PRJ5000( LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , USR_ID , PRJ_EVT_ID , EVT_TYPE, EVT_USE_CD , EVT_START_DATE , EVT_END_DATE , EVT_START_TIME , EVT_END_TIME , EVT_START_DAY_WEEK , EVT_END_DAY_WEEK , EVT_NM , EVT_DESC , EVT_BG_COLOR , EVT_COLOR , EVT_ALL_DAY_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP, MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #licGrpId# , #prjGrpId# , #prjId# , #usrId# , #newEvtId# , #evtType# , #evtUseCd# , REPLACE(#evtStartDate#,'-','') , REPLACE(#evtEndDate#,'-','') , REPLACE(#evtStartTime#,':','') , REPLACE(#evtEndTime#,':','') , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#evtStartDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'d' ) , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#evtEndDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'d' ) , #evtNm# , #evtDesc# , #evtBgColor# , #evtColor# , #evtAllDayCd# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PRJ5000 SET EVT_START_DATE = REPLACE(#evtStartDate#,'-','') , EVT_END_DATE = REPLACE(#evtEndDate#,'-','') , EVT_START_TIME = REPLACE(#evtStartTime#,':','') , EVT_END_TIME = REPLACE(#evtEndTime#,':','') , EVT_START_DAY_WEEK = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#evtStartDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'d' ) , EVT_END_DAY_WEEK = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#evtEndDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'d' ) ,
EVT_USE_CD = #evtUseCd# ,
EVT_NM = #evtNm# ,
EVT_DESC = #evtDesc# ,
EVT_BG_COLOR = #evtBgColor# ,
EVT_COLOR = #evtColor# ,
EVT_ALL_DAY_CD = #evtAllDayCd# ,
MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_EVT_ID = #prjEvtId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ5000 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND PRJ_EVT_ID = #prjEvtId#
sqlMap.select:
/* prj5000DAO.selectPrj5000ReqList 요구사항 일정 목록 조회 */ SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT '04' AS EVT_TYPE , B.LIC_GRP_ID , B.PRJ_GRP_ID , C.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM , A.PRJ_ID , B.PRJ_NM , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID AS USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, '1') AS USR_NM, A.PRJ_ID || A.REQ_ID AS PRJ_EVT_ID , A.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , '01' AS EVT_USE_CD , '예' AS EVT_USE_CD_NM , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS EVT_START_SEQ , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS EVT_END_SEQ , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS EVT_START_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS EVT_END_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'HH24:MI')) AS EVT_START_TIME , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'HH24:MI')) AS EVT_END_TIME , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) AS EVT_START_FULL_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) AS EVT_END_FULL_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'd'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'd')) AS EVT_START_DAY_WEEK , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'd'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'd')) AS EVT_END_DAY_WEEK , '[' || A.REQ_ORD || '] ' || A.REQ_NM AS EVT_NM , A.REQ_DESC AS EVT_DESC, NULL AS EVT_BG_COLOR , NULL AS EVT_COLOR , '03' AS EVT_ALL_DAY_CD , A.REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY, A.REG_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, '1') AS REG_USR_NM, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DTM_DAY, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.MODIFY_USR_ID, '1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM REQ4100 A INNER JOIN PRJ1000 B ON (B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) INNER JOIN PRJ1000 C ON (B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND B.PRJ_GRP_ID = C.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND B.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId#
AND ( REQ_ST_DU_DTM IS NOT NULL OR REQ_ST_DTM IS NOT NULL ) AND ( REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NOT NULL OR REQ_ED_DTM IS NOT NULL )
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
AND A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = #usrId#
) T1 WHERE 1=1

SELECT '04' AS EVT_TYPE , B.LIC_GRP_ID , B.PRJ_GRP_ID , C.PRJ_NM AS PRJ_GRP_NM , A.PRJ_ID , B.PRJ_NM , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID AS USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(NVL(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, A.REQ_USR_ID), '1') AS USR_NM, A.REQ_ID AS REQ_ID , A.PRJ_ID || A.REQ_ID AS PRJ_EVT_ID , '01' AS EVT_USE_CD , '예' AS EVT_USE_CD_NM , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS EVT_START_SEQ , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS EVT_END_SEQ , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS EVT_START_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS EVT_END_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'HH24:MI')) AS EVT_START_TIME , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'HH24:MI')) AS EVT_END_TIME , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) AS EVT_START_FULL_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) AS EVT_END_FULL_DATE , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DTM, 'd'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'd')) AS EVT_START_DAY_WEEK , NVL(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM, 'd'), TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'd')) AS EVT_END_DAY_WEEK , '[' || A.REQ_ORD || '] ' || A.REQ_NM AS EVT_NM , A.REQ_DESC AS EVT_DESC, NULL AS EVT_BG_COLOR , NULL AS EVT_COLOR , '03' AS EVT_ALL_DAY_CD , A.REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY, A.REG_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, '1') AS REG_USR_NM, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DTM_DAY, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.MODIFY_USR_ID, '1') AS MODIFY_USR_NM, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM REQ4100 A INNER JOIN PRJ1000 B ON (B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) INNER JOIN PRJ1000 C ON (B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND B.PRJ_GRP_ID = C.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
